inclusion.criterion: Recent AMI (within 21 days) defined according to ESC/ACC guidelines
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Doppler echocardiographic signs of elevated filling pressures defined as diastolic E/e' ratio >15, or diastolic E/e' ratio 8-15 and left atrial volume index>32 ml/m2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Permanent atrial fibrillation or paced rhythm
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
